subject: press links
text:
i tried to collect some of the press links in case we want to refer to
them at some point:

Die Zeit http://www.zeit.de/digital/internet/2012-08/terms-of-service-did-not-read/
The Atlantic http://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2012/08/finally-someone-read-the-terms-of-service-so-you-dont-have-to/260921/
NBC News http://www.technolog.msnbc.msn.com/technology/technolog/terms-service-too-long-site-reads-them-you-931724
Consumerist http://consumerist.com/2012/08/terms-of-service-too-long-this-site-reads-them-for-you.html
Legal Blog Watch (law.com)
http://legalblogwatch.typepad.com/legal_blog_watch/2012/08/too-lazy-to-read-the-terms-of-service-try-tosdr.html
The Blog for Biz Law
http://theblogforbusinesslaw.com/resource-of-the-week-tosdr-terms-of-service-didnt-read/
HackerNews http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=4350907
ZDNet http://www.zdnet.com/activists-aim-to-shame-web-firms-with-bad-terms-of-service-7000002600/
Time Moneyland http://moneyland.time.com/2012/08/10/new-site-grades-those-pesky-terms-of-service-agreements-you-never-read/
Huffington Post
http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2012/08/09/tosdr-terms-of-service_n_1761464.html
AgBeat http://agbeat.com/real-estate-technology-new-media/tosdr-reads-summarizes-terms-service-didnt/
GigaOm http://gigaom.com/2012/08/14/i-agree-why-terms-of-service-report-cards-are-a-good-idea/
YugaTech http://www.yugatech.com/the-internet/tosdr-aims-to-end-biggest-internet-lie/
DearAuthor http://dearauthor.com/news/thursday-news-tosdr-fair-use-rulings-and-poor-bn-nook-sales/
TechCrunch http://techcrunch.com/2012/08/13/putting-an-end-to-the-biggest-lie-on-the-internet/
Wired UK www.wired.co.uk/news/archive/2012-08/15/tos-dr-website
GizMag http://www.gizmag.com/tosdr-service/23712/
DVice http://dvice.com/archives/2012/08/tosdr-reads-ter.php
TechSpot http://www.techspot.com/news/49769-new-site-ranks-web-services-based-on-terms-of-service-agreements.html
The Verge http://www.theverge.com/2012/8/14/3241572/tos-dr-terms-of-service
AnimalNewYork http://www.animalnewyork.com/2012/tosdr-will-save-your-lazy-ass-from-confusing-exploitative-terms-of-service/
The Ides http://ides.winnefox.org/tos
TheEscapist http://www.escapistmagazine.com/forums/read/18.385113-TOS-DR-A-site-made-to-translate-Terms-of-Services
Reddit http://www.reddit.com/r/geek/duplicates/yc3n5/terms_of_service_didnt_read_site_if_the_tos_are/

http://www.social-move.de/2012/08/15/tosdr-und-die-groste-luge-im-netz-58561/
